scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C backend run typecheck && pnpm -C frontend run --if-present typecheck
scripts.test: pnpm -C backend run test && pnpm -C frontend run --if-present test
scripts.e2e: pnpm -C backend run e2e && pnpm -C frontend run --if-present e2e
scripts.build: pnpm -C backend run build && pnpm -C frontend run --if-present build
